ExploreFact.Text: A lone house on the pole of the planet. There is a hole in the floor that leads to a dark cave.

RumorFact.Text: I found a cave underneath a house that appears to lead further underground.

ExploreFact.Text: A strange, white crystal in a large chamber at the center of the planet. It emits a signal on the Electromagnetic Waves frequency.
A pillar of crystal emerged from the ground after I entered the room. The Crystal Heart started transmitting some sort of data into the pillar.
When I walked into the stream of data, it showed me a vision of what looked like the past and the future.
I woke up in a void filled with stars after losing consciousness. A strange white crystal and this system's sun were also there.
The stars started to disappear until the Sun was the only remaining star. Shortly afterwards the Sun also died, leaving me in complete darkness.

RumorFact.Text: I saw a dark tunnel leading out of the central chamber marked by a cairn with a crystal.

ExploreFact.Text: An old building that looks like it was used for refining crystals. There is a green crystal and a blue crystal on a pallet in the corner.
I found a lantern next to some drawings. The drawings show a lit candle being blown out by the wind, then a lit lantern resisting the wind.

RumorFact.Text: I saw a dark tunnel leading out of the central chamber marked by a cairn with a circle of lines.

ExploreFact.Text: A worn down building with a strange pedestal on the second floor.
I found a drawing next to the pedestal that shows a glowing crystal communicating with the Crystal Heart.
When I placed an unlit crystal on the table, it began to glow and started emitting a signal on the Electromagnetic Waves frequency.

RumorFact.Text: I saw a dark tunnel leading out of the central chamber marked by a cairn with a book.

ExploreFact.Text: An old building filled with writing tablets.
There is a locked door at the back of the building at the bottom of a staircase. A tablet at the top of the staircase shows a drawing of a lit lantern.
I found a strange diagram behind the locked door. It showed three glowing crystals- red, blue, and purple- centered in three different shapes.

RumorFact.Text: I saw a dark tunnel leading out of the central chamber marked by a cairn with three circles.

ExploreFact.Text: A relatively intact building with a large table at the center. The table has a large circle in the center surrounded by 3 different shapes.
I found a drawing on a wall next to the large table. It shows the layout of the table with 4 labeled areas: the large circle at the center, a pentagon, a hexagon, and a septagon.
